title: BA in Music
content: Getting my Bachelors in Music gave me the self-discipline, creativity, and introspection needed to be an outstanding problem-solver.

title: AppAcademy
content: AppAcademy is an rigorous 24-week course that taught me the technologies I would need to help me land my first Software Development job.

title: Instructor (IA)
content: After completing AppAcademy, I was asked to join the team! I helped students by answering questions, lecturing, and debugging code, all while diving deeper into the technologies AppAcademy teaches.

title: Next Step
content: I am currently looking for Software Developer positions I can add to my journey!
